source.title: Convex Overview | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: Convex reactive database architecture: query/mutation functions, `useQuery` hook subscriptions, WebSocket sync, document-relational model, ACID transactions, `ctx.db.query()`, client libraries, three-tier app structure.

source.title: Dev workflow | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: Convex project setup: `npx convex dev` command, `convex/` directory structure, `.env.local` deployment config, `convex/_generated` types, dashboard logs/health/data, `npx convex deploy` production workflow.

source.title: The Zen of Convex | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: Convex design philosophy and anti-patterns: prioritise sync engine queries over actions, avoid client-side caching, action workflow patterns, mutation return values, record progress incrementally, dashboard-driven debugging.

source.title: Best Practices | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: Production Convex best practices and anti-patterns: awaiting promises, avoiding `.filter()`/`.collect()` on large datasets, `withIndex` optimisation, `v` validators, `ctx.auth` access control, `internalMutation`/`internalQuery`, helper function organisation.

source.title: TypeScript | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: End-to-end TypeScript types: argument inference from validators, schema-driven `Doc`/`Id`, context types `QueryCtx`/`MutationCtx`/`ActionCtx`, `Infer` for validators, `WithoutSystemFields`, `FunctionReturnType`, `UsePaginatedQueryReturnType` for client annotations.

source.title: Next.js | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: Next.js App Router client-side integration: `ConvexReactClient` setup, `ConvexClientProvider` wrapper, `ConvexProviderWithAuth0`, Clerk/Auth0 authentication configuration, `Authenticated`/`Unauthenticated`/`AuthLoading` helpers, JWT tokens for hybrid server-client auth.

source.title: Next.js Server Rendering | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: Next.js SSR with Convex: `preloadQuery`/`usePreloadedQuery` for reactive preloading, `fetchQuery`/`fetchMutation`/`fetchAction` for Server Components, Server Actions, Route Handlers. JWT token auth, `preloadedQueryResult`, `Preloaded` type, consistency caveats.

source.title: ESLint rules | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: `@convex-dev/eslint-plugin` setup for ESLint 9 flat config `eslint.config.js` and legacy `.eslintrc`. Rules: `no-old-registered-function-syntax`, `require-argument-validators`, `explicit-table-ids`, `import-wrong-runtime`. Auto-fixable linting for Convex functions.

source.title: Next.js Quickstart | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: Step-by-step Convex + Next.js App Router setup: `npm create convex@latest`, `npx convex dev`, `npx convex import`, `ConvexProvider`, `ConvexReactClient`, `useQuery` hook, `api` generated module, `convex/` folder structure.

source.title: Database | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: Convex database fundamentals: tables, JSON-like documents, optional schemas with `defineSchema`/`defineTable`, document IDs, `v` validators. Entry point for reading/writing data in query/mutation functions.

source.title: AI Code Generation | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: AI coding assistant setup for Convex: `convex_rules.txt` for Cursor/Windsurf/Copilot, `CONVEX_AGENT_MODE` for background agents like Jules/Devin/Codex, MCP server integration. LLM leaderboard link.

source.title: Using Cursor with Convex | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: Cursor IDE setup for Convex: `.cursor/rules` with `.mdc` files, MCP server via `mcp.json`, `npx convex dev` for type generation, `@Convex` docs indexing, `README.md` context tips.

source.title: Convex MCP Server | Convex Developer Hub
source.description: Convex MCP server tools: `status`, `tables`, `data`, `runOneoffQuery`, `functionSpec`, `run`, `logs`, `envList`/`envGet`/`envSet`/`envRemove`. Install via `npx convex mcp start`. Editor-agnostic reference.
